title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking to learn more?  News Browse press releases, subscribe to updates and dig into archived news.   History & Culture Learn more about the history, structures, objects, and archeological resources at Fort Stanwix.    Education Bring Fort Stanwix to the classroom or the classroom to Fort Stanwix. Browse lesson plans, homeschool day events, field trip information, and professional development opportunities.    Meet Your Park Have you ever wondered how the National Park Services manages a park, day-to-day? Learn how your tax dollars are spent, long-range park planning and improvements, get links to detailed policies and regulations, and more. Photos & Multimedia Watch the 40 for 40 film series or browse photos of park events. Kids & Youth Learn how to become a junior ranger;look for youth events and activities, and find out about scouting programs available at the park. Bookstore The Fort Stanwix National Monument bookstore features a wide range of books and gifts that will appeal to the American Revolutionary War and French &Indian War buff, living historians, and the general public. Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.
